title: Astrologer Is The Dumped Girl's Best Friend
description: Tired of being dumped?Ask an advice from the Astrologer.Hilarious situations in beautiful Paris,and a lot of practical advices how to keep a man.Of course, you must first check where is your Lilith.Enjoy!Marlon is a young,handsome astrologer, dreaming to become a star.Recently,his two best friends have been dumped.Not only they,but most of his clients too.Angry about men's bad behavior, he opted for a revenge and contacted an expert of seducing and love affairs-the amazing Countess of Portland,Tatyana Medvedeva,three times married to millionaires.
author: J. Lov
